prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a large bill and a playful demeanor.
I want a flying Pokemon that resembles a pelican, with bright colors and a friendly face.
Generate an aquatic creature with a massive beak and distinct blue and yellow colors.
Make a Pokemon with a big mouth and wings, perfect for aerial battles over the sea.
Imagine a water/flying type Pokemon with a cheerful expression and a rounded body shape.
Design a gentle giant Pokemon with a large, bulbous body and a love for fishing.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives near water, with a unique blend of blue and yellow shades.
